pipo_common_error_card_check: Card number must only contain numbers
pipo_common_error_card_not_supported: Invalid or unsupported form of card
pipo_common_error_month_check: Month must be a number between 01 and 12
pipo_common_error_year_too_far: Year is too far into the future
pipo_payin_instruction_OCR_scan_notice: Align the edges of your bank card to this frame
pipo_payin_instruction_OCR_refused_camer: Unable to scan your bank card. Go to "Setting">"{APPname}" and enable camera access.
pipo_payin_instruction_OCR_refused_album: Unable to select your bank card photo. Go to "Setting">"{APPname}" and enable album access.
pipo_payin_dropin_cashier_networkerror_s: Connect to the internet and try again.
pipo_payin_instruction_OCR_toast_no_card: No card number detected. Please select another picture
pipo_common_payin_ccinstallment_incorrec: Card doesn’t match the selected bank or doesn’t support installment plans
